title: Analyze the home-front experience of Americans

content.question: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments clearly and logically. Analyze the home-front experiences of TWO of the following groups during the Second World War. African Americans Japanese Americans Jewish Americans Mexican Americans

frqParts.text: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
